issues.title: 2025-08-18 至 2025-08-24 周报 / Weekly
issues.summaryCN: 本周经严核的科技/IT大事件精选。
issues.summaryEN: Verified, cross-sourced tech/IT developments for the week.

items.title: 苹果修补被利用零日 / Apple patches exploited zero-day
factsCN: 苹果发布 iOS/iPadOS 18.6.2、iPadOS 17.7.10 与 macOS 15.6.1/14.7.8/13.7.8，修复 ImageIO 越界写 CVE-2025-43300；苹果称可能在定向攻击中被利用。
factsEN: Apple shipped iOS/iPadOS 18.6.2, iPadOS 17.7.10, and macOS 15.6.1/14.7.8/13.7.8 to fix ImageIO OOB write CVE-2025-43300; Apple notes possible targeted exploitation.
items.whyCN: 跨平台通路被证实存在在野利用，尽快更新可降风险。
items.whyEN: Confirmed in-the-wild exploitation across Apple platforms warrants rapid patching.

items.title: Cloudflare 与 AWS us-east-1 链路拥塞 / Cloudflare–AWS us-east-1 congestion
factsCN: 8 月 22 日 00:27–04:18（SGT），单租户流量暴增导致 Cloudflare 与 AWS us-east-1 互联拥塞，出现延迟/丢包；非攻击或 BGP 劫持。
factsEN: From 00:27 to 04:18 SGT on Aug 22, a surge from a single customer congested Cloudflare’s interconnects to AWS us-east-1, causing latency/loss; not an attack or BGP hijack.
items.whyCN: 跨云互联的容量瓶颈会放大单租户异常的系统性影响。
items.whyEN: Interconnect bottlenecks can turn a single-tenant spike into systemic impact.

items.title: Chrome 139 发布并执行 CA 信任收缩 / Chrome 139 ships; CA distrust
factsCN: Chrome 稳定版 139.0.7258.138/.139 推出，修复 V8 越界写 CVE-2025-9132；从 v139 起不再信任 Chunghwa Telecom 与 NetLock 新签发服务器证书。
factsEN: Chrome stable 139.0.7258.138/.139 fixes V8 OOB write CVE-2025-9132; from v139, new server certs by Chunghwa Telecom and NetLock are distrusted by default.

keyInfo.impact: CVE-2025-9132; CA distrust enforcement from v139

image.caption: Chrome 139 安全更新与根存储政策

items.whyCN: 修复高危脚本引擎缺陷并调整根信任，影响用户安全与网站证书运维。
items.whyEN: A V8 fix plus root trust change impacts both safety and certificate operations.

items.title: CISA 将 Apex One 零日列入 KEV / CISA adds Apex One zero-day to KEV
factsCN: CISA 将 Trend Micro Apex One 控制台命令注入 CVE-2025-54948 列入 KEV，要求按时修复；厂商已发布缓解与补丁。
factsEN: CISA added Trend Micro Apex One command-injection CVE-2025-54948 to KEV; vendor released mitigation and patches.

image.caption: Apex One 零日被列入 KEV

items.whyCN: 列入 KEV 代表确认在野利用，必须优先处置。
items.whyEN: KEV listing means confirmed exploitation and mandates priority remediation.

items.title: NVIDIA 推出 Spectrum-XGS / NVIDIA unveils Spectrum-XGS
factsCN: NVIDIA 在 Hot Chips 宣布 Spectrum-XGS，以 Ethernet “scale-across” 连接多数据中心，构建统一 AI 集群；CoreWeave 将率先部署。
factsEN: NVIDIA announced Spectrum-XGS Ethernet “scale-across” to link multiple data centers into a unified AI cluster; CoreWeave to adopt early.

keyInfo.impact: Spectrum-XGS as part of Spectrum-X platform

items.whyCN: AI 规模跨园区，网络确定性与延迟治理成为竞争点。
items.whyEN: Cross-DC AI scale makes deterministic, low-latency networking a key differentiator.

items.title: Zoom 修复 Windows 提权高危漏洞 / Zoom fixes Windows EoP
factsCN: Zoom 修复 Windows 客户端不受信任搜索路径漏洞 CVE-2025-49457（CVSS 9.6）；多数受影响版本低于 6.3.10，涵盖 VDI/Rooms/SDK 等。
factsEN: Zoom patched Windows untrusted search path CVE-2025-49457 (CVSS 9.6); most affected versions < 6.3.10, covering VDI/Rooms/SDK, etc.
items.whyCN: 广泛部署客户端的提权可被用于横向移动与持久化。
items.whyEN: Unauthenticated EoP in a widely deployed client aids lateral movement and persistence.
